name: Álex Palou
status: Currently racing in IMSA SportsCar Championship and  IndyCar Series for Chip Ganassi Racing
introduction: lex Palou Montalbo' (PA-loh;[1] born 1 April 1997) is a Spanish racing driver born in Sant Antoni de Vilamajor, Spain. He drives for Chip Ganassi Racing in the IndyCar Series, where he won the 2021 series championship. He is the first Spanish racing driver to win a National Championship in American open-wheel racing history and also the first Spaniard to win in the GP3 Series.
